name: Maskbear
description: Maskbear is a mysterious pokemon found in wooded areas. Wearing an ancient mask, it has a powerful presence that draws fear and respect. Its dramatic entrance often catches its prey off-guard, and its amazing agility and powerful Smash and Tackle attacks make it a difficult adversary to overcome. Its day-to-day life consists of foraging for food and protecting its habitat from intruders.
image_prompt: Maskbear::0 a strong fairy-type bear pokemon::1.8, wearing a ancient mask, in a woods environment, orange and blue ambient lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
